normalized: 50 hours after the destruction of the taihei island base――
a certain place on the outskirts of the capital.
a research facility building of 『orange industry』, a corporation with its main office in the american federation.
10 storeys underground.
a research area securely protected by armed guards.
the maintenance room.
the figure of asuka could be seen in there.

name: asuka
normalized: hey, aren't you done～～?
asuka said, looking bored.
the staff, which was mainly white people, pretended not to hear her complain for the nth time.

name: asuka
normalized: make it end quickly.
i can't move from here, after all.
asuka, who pouted her lips, was sitting in her personal maintenance seat.
her android arms ＆ legs were detached, and were under maintenance in another place.

name: asuka
normalized: not yet, kotanicchi?
asuka called out to the man who seemed the busiest, even among the hectically working staff.

name: kotani
normalized: a little longer.
really, if it's anyone's fault――
with his name called by asuka, kotani kenji, the man in charge, turned his head.
round glasses, a pudding bowl haircut, a white robe on top of a baggy shirt and trousers.

to judge from appearances, he felt like an assistant teacher with no potential for advancement, but in truth, he was the high-level researcher in charge of the japan branch of the dso （defense scientific office）.
the dso was one of the american federation's governmental organizations, a subordinate office of the department of defense.
because the android arms ＆ legs that asuka was equipped with had been developed by the dso, she received backups accordingly.
and kotani was the top gun of technology at the dso, japan branch.
in other words, he was number 2 of this place.
the face of that number 2 was frowning curiously.

name: asuka
normalized: uwah.

name: kotani
normalized: if you didn't act so unreasonably, i would have released you from there a while ago, asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: ahh!
i knew it, kotanicchi got mad!
asuka ducked her head with a start, somewhat exaggeratedly.
kotani showed no reaction.

name: asuka
normalized: you are angry… right?
asuka asked nervously with upturned eyes.

name: kotani
normalized: very, since you've broken all of a sudden.
kotani made a glancing scowl at asuka, both hands crammed into the pockets of his white gown.

name: asuka
normalized: uu～…
asuka moaned.

name: kotani
normalized: anything to say?
to me, or the staff of this place?
everyone is working without sleep or rest for your sake.

name: asuka
normalized: …i'm sorry.
asuka lowered her head, unusually demure.
she may have destroyed the taihei island base, but having used her android arms ＆ legs recklessly had been unwise.
due to operating beyond the limits of her strength, and emitting the large energy beam, she had caused damage and strain in almost every moveable part of her arms and legs.
as for the left arm, which had become entirely unable to move, the elbow joints had broken completely, so they had to replace the super- electromagnetic motors.
although data had been acquired through the fight, it was overkill.
even the “steel goddess of death” had reflected on that.
kotani shrugged his shoulders at asuka's appearance, seeming to want to say 『good grief』.

name: kotani
normalized: that's not true.
the head you brought back, it's going through analysis, but that's something.

name: asuka
normalized: really?
she raised her face a little, as if to determine the mood.

name: kotani
normalized: yeah, it looks like the report from six months ago that the chinese union had procured edwin black's cells and produced a monster was true.

name: asuka
normalized: does that seem helpful?

name: kotani
normalized: yes, it's a great accomplishment.
kotani nodded, with a face that said “kind big brother”.
there was a rumour that his american wife had been charmed by that smiling face, and had picked up and married kotani during his backpacking days.
1 child.
any way you looked at it he was japanese, but he had already been naturalized in the american federation, and his real name now kenji anderson.
however, when he was called that by asuka, he made a rather displeased-looking face.
puzzling.
be that as it may, asuka also made a smiling face at the words “great accomplishment”.

name: asuka
normalized: yes!
hey, then i can go to school, right?
she asked, but kotani quickly shook his head.

name: kotani
normalized: today it's impossible.

name: asuka
normalized: eh…?!
even though i called them to say i could go to school from noon onwards…

name: kotani
normalized: it's fine, i'll tell the school that you'll be absent today.

name: asuka
normalized: mm.
asuka puffed out her cheeks.
it wasn't fine at all.

name: kotani
normalized: you're not pleased?
asuka squared her shoulders at kotani, who made a surprised face.

name: asuka
normalized: i have plans too.

name: kotani
normalized: plans?
kotani asked, with eyes that said, 『what kind?
asuka hesitated briefly, but

name: asuka
normalized: mm, my classmate, ishiyama-kun, said “let's go to the movies together as we go back from school.

name: kotani
normalized: huh?
he made a blank face for a moment.

name: asuka
normalized: （…i'm annoyed.

name: asuka
normalized: it was an invitation to a movie!

name: kotani
normalized: from ishiyama-kun?

name: asuka
normalized: from ishiyama-kun.

name: kotani
normalized: this is a surprise.
asuka has a boyfriend.
are you going out with him?
kotani asked frankly.

name: asuka
normalized: i'm not doing anything like going out with him!
i just said ok because he was persistent!
asuka raised her voice.
a stiff crease appeared between her eyebrows, as if she fiercely protested.
kotani, not caring about her feelings at all,

name: kotani
normalized: is he a good-looking boy?

name: asuka
normalized: it looks like he's somewhat popular as the vocalist or whatever for the light music club, but i'm not interested at all.

name: asuka
normalized: at all.
she said again, because it was important.

normalized: and despite that, you said ok?
kotani tilted his head to the side in curiosity.

name: kotani
normalized: why?

name: asuka
normalized: wh, why?
that's…

name: asuka
normalized: because… i want to teach my stupid brother a lesson…
she mumbled so as to gloss over it.

name: kotani
normalized: your otouto-kun?
he's the boy asuka often talks about, right?
kousuke-kun, if i remember rightly.

name: asuka
normalized: yeah, kousuke.
asuka nodded, as her face became red.

name: kotani
normalized: you're going to punish kousuke-kun?

name: asuka
normalized: yeah.
i'm going to show stupid otouto that onee-sama is reeally popular.
asuka threw out her chest, like she was saying, 『you get it, right?

name: kotani
normalized: how?
kotani tilted his head more and more, staring fixedly at asuka.
asuka averted her eyes and mumbled once again.

name: asuka
normalized: b, b, by… saying ok to an invitation from the most popular boy in school…

name: kotani
normalized: no, how are you going to show that to otouto-kun, who lives far away from you?

name: asuka
normalized: （…annoyed.
kotani had gone into it in depth with the coolness typical of a scientist.
asuka sullenly remained silent.
but even so, kotani questioned her further.

name: kotani
normalized: how could your otouto-kun be punished by that to begin with?

name: asuka
normalized: （…annoyed annoyed annoyed!
it wasn't cynicism.
his face looked like he was sincerely wondering.

name: asuka
normalized: never mind…
asuka answered with a sour expression.

name: kotani
normalized: eh?
i don't think that's good, but…

name: asuka
normalized: enough!
asuka said flatly, and suddenly turned away.

name: asuka
normalized: （really now, this is why he's a scientist!
his impassivity!

name: kotani
normalized: i don't understand very well.
well, how――oh, it looks like they're ready.
now, we'll install them.
her limbs, which had finished being serviced, had been brought in.
finally, she would be liberated from this condition of being unable to move around.

name: asuka
normalized: well, if you would!
asuka said forcefully, as if she had switched moods.
gachaah!

name: asuka
normalized: tss!
asuka suddenly knit her eyebrows.
there was a sharp pain when they attached the android arms ＆ legs.
generally speaking, the pain that people who had lost arms or legs felt in the parts that weren't there was called phantom pain.
asuka's situation was the opposite―she felt a pain like being numbed by electricity because her limbs, which were meant to have been lost, were suddenly put into an “existent” state.
that happened because they connected things that inherently conflicted: her flesh-and-blood nerve tissue, and the nervous circuits of the artificial limbs.

she was grateful for her android arms ＆ legs, which worked better than her original arms and legs, and the connection pain itself disappeared in just a moment due to the networking of machine with living flesh, but she never got used to it.

name: asuka
normalized: fuu, i hate this, every time.
asuka said, exhaling slightly.
contrary to her remark, she had a chipper smiling face due to finally having her limbs returned.

name: kotani
normalized: you can do nothing about this but have patience.
how are they?
do they feel properly?
kotani said, in order to pacify asuka, and tapped on the surface of the artificial limbs that had just been attached with a cylinder-shaped sensor.

name: asuka
normalized: yeah.
perfectly.
asuka nodded at the accurate sensation.

android-type artificial arms ＆ legs―which were moved at will via a linkage with the nerves―were in common use, but even though they supported a truly fundamental part of one's life, that was the highest level at which they worked.
they were not endowed with sensory functionality equal to a flesh-and- blood human, like the ones asuka was equipped with.
furthermore, asuka's android arms ＆ legs could even sometimes cut off unneeded sensory functions, such as her sense of pain, during combat.
if they couldn't, she wouldn't be able to break through steel with her fists.

name: asuka
normalized: can i try to move?

name: kotani
normalized: feel free.
slowly in the beginning, okay?

name: asuka
normalized: uh-huh.
asuka nodded, and made the thumb, index finger and middle finger of her right hand, which sat on the armrest, rise in sequence.
kyui… kyui…
asuka's fingers moved with a motor sound so slight that it could barely be heard by her reinforced ears.
and so, after lifting each finger one-by-one, up to her little finger, she then brought them back towards her thumb.
she repeated this over and over.

name: asuka
normalized: yeah, feels good, feels good♪
kyuu, kyuu, kyuu, kyuu…
her fingers gradually became faster, but the movement, which had the unparalleled accuracy typical of a machine, did not change.
after repeating the finger movement to the point where it looked to an ordinary person's eyes like it had become unable to stop, asuka flipped her hand over and made a fist.
gyuru――

name: asuka
normalized: eh?
this is a little…
asuka opened her eyes wide, as if she had noticed something from that.

name: asuka
normalized: it's been upgraded?
while saying so, as if to ask her own arm, she lifted her right arm up next to her head.
kyunn!

name: asuka
normalized: ah… terrific.
the speed far exceeded the android arm that asuka knew.

name: asuka
normalized: uryaa!
asuka grinned as she swung her clenched fist down onto the armrest.
guonn!
a tremendous air-cutting noise resounded.
to everyone's eyes, it looked like the fist would destroy the armrest, but it suddenly stood still on the brink of doing so.

name: asuka
normalized: hahaa～～♪
asuka smiled with her entire face.

name: asuka
normalized: this is nice!
the appearance is the same as the one before, and yet!
this arm, it's amazingly good!
asuka looked at kotani, and he was making a triumphant face.

name: kotani
normalized: you see?
the dso concentrated all our energies on developing those anti-demon android arms ＆ legs, after all.
they evolve every day.

name: asuka
normalized: the hand swings really smoothly!
look look look!
as though pleased with a new toy, asuka, still sitting down, demonstrated sending out punches again and again.
the atmosphere of the maintenance room shook violently from that alone.
the staffers, who were lined up, said,「ohh」.

name: asuka
normalized: this is really amazing!
it feels like the power and speed have doubled!

name: kotani
normalized: doubled is an overstatement, but since we decreased the friction in the drive system to its utmost limit, the power and speed should have increased substantially.
moreover, the strength limits were increased considerably.

name: asuka
normalized: as you'd expect of kotanicchi!
and everyone else on staff!

name: asuka
normalized: thank you!

with a smile that appeared to sparkle.
the staffers also replied to that with happy faces.

name: kotani
normalized: we are the grateful ones.
it's all because of asuka's cooperation.
thanks to you, the research is progressing rapidly.

name: asuka
normalized: really?

name: kotani
normalized: indeed.
these latest-model android arms ＆ legs were made from the research data related to the taimanin that we got from asuka, after all.
kotani said enthusiastically.
certainly, as compensation for the dso supporting her, asuka was cooperating in the development of their taimanin and hellish medical technologies.
although she had flown out of the taimanin village, it would be a lie to say that she hadn't hesitated at all to collaborate with a government organization of the american federation.

however, no matter how much more strength her android arms ＆ legs possessed than human ones, if she neglected routine maintenance, she would lose that functionality in the blink of an eye and become unable to move one bit.
she couldn't accomplish her objective without making some sacrifices.
outside of asuka's thoughts, the excited kotani was beginning to talk nonstop.

name: kotani
normalized: you taimanin are truly wonderous beings.
the source of the power of the ninja arts you refer to, we call taima particles…

name: asuka
normalized: （ah… crap.

normalized: these taima particles are constantly surrounding you, and their concentration suddenly rises when you invoke your ninja arts.

name: kotani
normalized: that disappearing and reappearing characteristic looks just like the phenomenon at the moment of particle collision.

name: kotani
normalized: you understand?
when you make particles collide in a super- accelerator, the elementary particles disappear!

name: kotani
normalized: your existence might prove five-dimensional cosmology!

name: kotani
normalized: this is my personal hypothesis, but the unconscious abilities of you taimanin――

name: kotani
normalized: okay, for example, i'm wondering if it isn't possible to spontaneously deposit and withdraw power from a different dimension, like how a dolphin converses via electromagnetic waves.

name: kotani
normalized: in five-dimensional theory, only gravity vanishes into that world, but it's similar to that.

name: kotani

name: kotani

normalized: ah, it's too bad.
if this project weren't a top secret task for the department of defense, i would likely win a nobel prize… hey, are you listening?

normalized: eh?!
why?

asagi, asagi.

acting supremely disgracefully with a serious mother complex, it was disgusting.
